Germany Linux VPS

LeasedLayer providing Germany Linux VPS Hosting Services with full root access for administration. We have very high configured servers on which these vps`s are hosted giving optium performance even being on shared resources. Our VPS Packages are suitable for forex trading, game servers, VPN and special routing solutions. All VPS are provided on OpenVZ Virtualization Technology.
